Free meal inviter
===============================

version number: 0.0.1
author: Alberto Egido

Overview
--------

Invite friends around you for a free meal.

Installation / Usage
--------------------

To install use pip:

    $ pip install free_meal_inviter


Or clone the repo:

    $ git clone https://github.com/bertucho/free_meal_inviter.git
    $ python setup.py install
